data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Jieyang, Guangdong, China to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jieyang, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Jieyang.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,116,000 souls living in the county of Jieyang with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Jieyang, Guangdong, China today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Lakkia people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Lakkia people.
Pour your Spirit out on the 2,116,000 citizens of Jieyang, Guangdong, China, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Jieyang, Guangdong, China that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.section_summary:
the county of Jieyang, Guangdong, China has a population of 2,116,000.

We estimate Jieyang has 160,522 people who might know Jesus, 34,184 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,921,294 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Jieyang, Guangdong, China to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

location.name: Jieyang
